description: Use for MATLAB since that doesn't have any GUI color options.
This is fantastic, simple black and white pdfs and journal articles no longer make me hate the world. This app makes my eyeballs so happy. Thank you
summary: PDFs no longer burn my eyes

description:
It's strange to see the Photo colors in the inverse, but the white to black and black to white is great for reading text at night for any site like Google or Wikipedia that have such an unbearably bright background.
This extension is so easy to use; no need to hover with a mouse or find a function button to click. Just have to remember the letter "i" in conjunction with the "Windows" button.
summary: Great for using the bright Google and Wikipedia at night

description: works without a hitch. finally, I can read PDFs in less-than-perfectly bright places without wanting to die.
Ideal para personas como yo que tiene que leer documentos por mucho tiempo

summary: Oh my god This is totally awesome!!!!!
